actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Lands

official_title: To amend the Antiquities Act to limit the authority of the President to designate areas in excess of 5,000 acres as national monuments, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Antiquities Act of 1906 to prohibit the President from exercising authority under such Act to declare any area in excess of 5,000 acres to be a national monument. Makes this Act effective with respect to any presidential proclamation issued after January 1, 1996.

titles.title: To amend the Antiquities Act to limit the authority of the President to designate areas in excess of 5,000 acres as national monuments, and for other purposes.
